entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of thunderstorms this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:12 PM PDT Monday 3 April 2023
